org.archive.wayback.replay.charset

Class UniversalChardetSniffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.archive.wayback.replay.charset.BaseEncodingSniffer
      • org.archive.wayback.replay.charset.UniversalChardetSniffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EncodingSniffer

    public class UniversalChardetSniffer
extends BaseEncodingSniffer
    EncodingSniffer that runs UniversalDetector on the content.

    Note: as of version 1.0.3, UniversalDetector returns null for ASCII-only text encoded as either UTF-8 or UTF-16.
